pr_title: Support multiple attachments in Ballerina task scheduler

timeline.message: Support multiple attachments in task schedulers
Remove unnecessary constructor in ServiceInformation Object
Fix spotbugs issues and rename multiple attachment test function
Remove redundant variable assignment in SchedulerError creation

timeline.bodyText:
How does this behave in the error cases? If the # of onTrigger resource param count and the # of attach() function params are different, null will be returned.
If the above is validated during the compile-time, then this condition is not necessary. WDYT?
timeline.author: chamil321

replies.bodyText:
Ideally, this should be validated in the compile time, but unfortunately, we can't write compiler plugin for this, just yet. (See #14148)
Therefore this is added. But since this is invoked from a resource function, we cannot return any error here. Is there a way to reflect this error scenario?
replies.author: ThisaruGuruge
